tool_description: Facilitates content review workflow by assigning articles to reviewers, tracking review status, collecting feedback, and managing approval processes for knowledge base articles.

article_id.description: Unique identifier of the article to review

reviewer_name.description: Name of the person assigned to review the article

review_type.description: Type of review: Technical, Editorial, or Compliance

review_action.description: Review action: assign, submit_feedback, approve, or reject

feedback_text.description: Detailed feedback comments from the reviewer

priority.description: Review priority: Low, Medium, High, or Urgent

error_messages: Invalid review type: Must be one of Technical, Editorial, or Compliance
Invalid review action: Must be one of assign, submit_feedback, approve, or reject
Invalid priority: Must be one of Low, Medium, High, or Urgent
Feedback required: feedback_text must be provided for submit_feedback and reject actions
Invalid date format: due_date must be in ISO 8601 format
Article not found: Specified article_id does not exist
Review already completed: Cannot modify a review that has been approved or rejected
usage: Provide article_id, reviewer_name, review_type, and review_action. For feedback submission or rejection, include feedback_text. Optionally set priority and due_date for review scheduling and tracking.

review_id.description: Unique identifier for the review session

review_status.description: Current status of the review process

next_action.description: Recommended next step in the review process
